meanings.definition: The time of day when the sun is highest in the sky and it is midday.
meanings.sent1: During noonday, the sun shines brightly overhead.
meanings.sent2: People often have lunch at noonday.
meanings.sent3: At noonday, the shadows disappear completely.
meanings.sent4: The heat of noonday can be quite intense.
meanings.sent5: The farmers rested under the shade during noonday.

meanings.definition: The light or brightness of the sun at midday.
meanings.sent1: The noonday brightness made everything look clearer.
meanings.sent2: She squinted in the intense noonday light.
meanings.sent3: The noonday glow illuminated the entire room.
meanings.sent4: The noonday sun cast sharp shadows on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The noonday radiance warmed their faces.
